snippet: The American national team defender DeAndre Yedlin signed a four-year deal with Tottenham Hotspur on Wednesday.
abstract: American national soccer team defender DeAndre Yedlin signs four-year deal with Tottenham Hotspur, but will remain in United States with Seattle Sounders through remainder of Major League Soccer season; Borussia Dortmund beats Bayern Munich, 2-0, in German Super Cup in Frankfurt.
lead_paragraph: The American national team defender DeAndre Yedlin signed a four-year deal with Tottenham Hotspur on Wednesday.

headline.main: Young American to Play in England
headline.print_headline: Young American to Play in England
